General.Name: Utechzone Co Ltd
General.Description: Utechzone Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and markets automatic optical inspection products in Taiwan. It provides PCB, FPD, semiconductor inspection services, and other inspection products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 268, Liancheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23553

1.Name: Mr. Fahren  Lin
1.Title: Vice GM of Admin. & Fin. Department and Director
